feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: API v2 recurring spelling by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14620
  • fix: Hide org tab when you are team admin by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14627
  • fix: add new styling for emoji links by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14481
  • chore: settings design match by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14630
  • fix: use 'success' value for better accuracy by @chronark in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14624
  • feat: AI Transcribe by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14140
  • fix: 500 on forbidden showing up in logs by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14636
  • fix: v2 app.rewrites.middleware.ts by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14626
  • fix: add linting exception for website by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14645
  • chore: atoms 1.0.29 + fix typing issues by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14633
  • feat: booker atom custom location by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14635
  • fix: Namespaced react embeds not working with Floating and Element Click Popups by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13386
  • chore: atoms 1.0.30 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14650
  • fix: v2 e2e tests by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14655
  • fix: api v2 - platform users can disable emails and display their links by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14604
  • fix: managed users check if exist by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14649
  • feat: Tasker by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14180
  • chore: Remove all avatar/logo references by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14532
  • fix: only boot intercom if .env variable is set by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14656
  • feat: include org role in org session data by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14652
  • chore: Add self serve variable in tests by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14665
  • chore: better string for "Create an Out of Office" by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14647
  • fix: remove away view by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14672
  • fix: get llm response schema by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14670
  • chore: Removing away (DB related, not slot related) from code by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14673
  • fix: credit card icon by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14678
  • fix: managed type url in orgs by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14698
  • fix: show toast in center of screen by @guvvanch in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14690
  • fix: tooltip text on Create event type dialog by @Tasztalos69 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14681
  • fix: Private settings of the event disabled after making changes to your event by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14628
  • fix: Date Override Modal Trims Date Picker by @smk1993 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14680
  • fix: Update visibility of team members based on user role by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14629
  • feat: updated the useage of listCurrent in the app and use org role from session by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14653
  • fix: send completed_onboarding to intercom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14703
  • fix: Managed event isnâ€™t showing in the upcoming bookings when filtered by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14552
  • fix: invalid Cancelled / Rescheduled downstream calendar block by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14700
  • fix: Avatar API isn't ran at signup handler by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14675

New Contributors

  • @guvvanch made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14690
  • @Tasztalos69 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14681
  • @smk1993 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14680

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.0.1...v4.0.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: browser back button not working by @abhijeetsingh-22 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13345
  • fix: Add navigatedToBooker event and fix infinite loop of events by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14694
  • feat: improve error handling for signup events by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14668
  • chore: "toggle transcription" to "Cal.ai" by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14710
  • chore: EventManager add cancelEvent method by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14261
  • feat: SMS/Whatsapp to attendee for teams by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14648
  • chore: v4.0.2 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14724
  • fix: Improve French translations by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14718
  • feat: Add app store entry for "Autocheckin" (Challenge/Bounty) by @pgvr in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14683
  • fix: settings layout for org admin by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14723
  • chore: v4.0.3 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14725

New Contributors

  • @pgvr made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14683

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.0.2...v4.0.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: booker atom not resetting month query param by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14715
  • fix: booker atom reschedule data by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14714
  • fix: booker atom month reset by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14732
  • fix: Check permissions for team OOO entries by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14736
  • chore: bump atoms 1.0.35 and wrap context by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14744
  • fix: oAuthClient Creation Form by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14750
  • fix: Credential Syncing Improvements by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14588
  • feat: SDK README docs. by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14761
  • chore: SDK cleanup by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14763
  • chore: v4.0.4 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14764

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.0.3...v4.0.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: v2 managed user create default schedule given timeZone by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14727
  • feat: Add ratings to insights by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14687
  • refactor: booker atom unmount reset duration query param by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14766
  • feat: Platform Rate limiting + access token caching by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14560
  • feat: date range picker by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14713
  • feat: Hide recurring tab when payments are enabled by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14731
  • fix: Embed - Get element click popup working for a descendant element by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14749
  • fix: confirm booking doesn't respect minimum booking notice by @aeswibon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14577
  • feat: Add linting rule to recursively check for Prisma includes usingâ€¦ by @Nis-Han in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13652
  • chore: api v2 tsconfig manual path to internal packages by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14771
  • fix: missing round_robin_emailed_you_and_attendees and round_robin_emailed_you_and_attendees_recurring translations in fr by @lambertrocher in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14773
  • fix: The organisation avatar is not always shown for subteams by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14777
  • feat: Add app store entry for Clic (CheckIn application) by @chrisdadev13 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14754
  • feat: when creating workflow from within event-type, preselect it by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14774
  • fix: v2 ts config and errors by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14799
  • fix: Unbork Team POST API by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14803
  • revert: "fix: invalid Cancelled / Rescheduled downstream calendar blocâ€¦ by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14800
  • feat: add additional attributes to intercom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14794
  • fix: With Credential Sync enabled, fix expired google calendar token handling - Refresh wasn't working by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14788
  • fix: Resource owner id check only in case credentialSync is enabled which absolutely need it. by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14814
  • feat: Billing Service by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14756
  • chore: Update yarn.lock file by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14812
  • chore: Increase E2E shards to 7 by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14818
  • v4.0.5 by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14820

New Contributors

  • @aeswibon made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14577
  • @lambertrocher made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14773
  • @chrisdadev13 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14754

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.0.4...v4.0.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: send organization_id to intercom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14811
  • chore: Bring back next-18next.config.js by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14841
  • chore: Update README.md by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14819
  • fix: availability.e2e.ts - Date Overrides by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14845
  • chore: Add default to match migration for Platform Billing by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14847
  • chore: small UI fix for insights by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14839
  • test: add unit tests for sms sending by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14737
  • chore: Allow disabling attendee emails if SMS_ATTENDEE is a part of the workflow by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14806
  • chore: fixed enterprise warning and description by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14791
  • chore: Attach unique request ids by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14857
  • chore: don't try to increase usage for legacy plans by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14856
  • fix: Snippet path in preview by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14830
  • chore: Discard unused Platform stripe events by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14822
  • chore: v4.0.6 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14865

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.0.5...v4.0.6
